inclusion.criterion: birth weight adequate for gestational age
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: mothers screened for GBS at 35-37 weeks gestation
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Preterm or small/large for gestational age infants;
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Infants admitted to the Neonatal Intensive Care Unit;
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Infants who received any antibiotic treatment after birth;
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Signs of infection and/or any serious clinical conditions that contraindicate the participation in the study;
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient is a pregnant woman who developed symptoms of UTI, but has no history of recurrent UTIs. She was treated with antibiotics after birth.
